values: God Is: The Life-Altering Reality of Sheer Divine ExistenceGod Is: The Life-Altering Reality of Sheer Divine Existence

God is. No reality is more mind-boggling, more valuable, more life-altering, more electrifying than the absolute being of God.God is. No reality is more mind-boggling, more valuable, more life-altering, more electrifying than the absolute being of God.
